==Useful Info==
'''Crocodiles''' are large lizards that bite hard, drag their targets backwards, and have enough [[HP]] to take a few hits. Although rarely a major threat, don't underestimate them if you're playing a fragile character. They are usually found in certain [[sewer]] and [[ossuary]] maps.

==Tips & Tricks==
*Certain [[cold]]-based attacks may [[slow]] them, giving mages and light armour users time to soften them up from afar before getting in melee.
*Unlike [[trample]], their dragging attack doesn't check your character's [[size]].
*Just because you can handle a crocodile doesn't mean you can take on an [[alligator]]. Those [[Swamp]] inhabitants are ''much'' deadlier.

==History==
*In [[0.31]], crocodiles were reintroduced as [[sewer]] and [[ossuary]] exclusives. They got a new '''AF_DRAG''' attack flavour, which allows them to pull the target back.
*Crocodiles were removed in [[0.26]].
